daily_take.headline: Iran Strike Odds Crater as Middle East Temperature Drops Fast
daily_take.deck: The probability of a US or Israeli strike on Iran before the end of February tanked 9 percentage points in 24 hours, settling at 11%. The sharp reversal suggests traders are pricing in a genuine de-escalation rather than the tit-for-tat cycle that defined 2024. Something shifted in the geopolitical calculus, and the market is voting with its money.
